name: shenyu-workspace
description: A powerful AI conversation platform with multiple model support and extensible plugin system
author: Shenyu Team

scripts.build: npm run build -w @shenyu/frontend && npm run build -w @shenyu/backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w @shenyu/frontend && npm run clean -w @shenyu/backend
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare -w @shenyu/frontend && npm run prepare -w @shenyu/backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w @shenyu/frontend && npm install -w @shenyu/backend
